sections.heading: When any garnishee answers and plaintiff is not satisfied with the answer, he or she shall serve a reply within 20 days thereafter denying the allegations of the answer as he or she desires
sections.text: On failure of plaintiff to file a reply, the answer shall be taken as true and on proper disposition of the a

sections.heading: Judgment against the garnishee on the garnishee’s answer or after trial of a reply to the garnishee’s answer shall be entered for the amount of his or her liability as disclosed by the answer or trial
sections.text: Instead of scire facias, the court may subpoena the garnishee to inquire about his or her liabilit
